name: 2D Platformer (TransGame668)
description: There a 6 level in it. All level has been unlocked, So you can try them all. Find the "Stop" Sign for Winning the Game. When you falling, the character will be respawn and the music not start over again. To control the character Press "A" for left & "D" for Right or Use Arrow Keys, Jumping Press Spacebar. Back To Main Menu Press "esc".
